titles.title: To repeal the Office of Financial Research, and for other purposes.
To repeal the Office of Financial Research, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act to eliminate the Office of Financial Research. The bill also provides for funding for the Financial Stability Oversight Council. (Under current law, the council is funded by the Office of Financial Research.)
